rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall leading into the main living area, with floor-to-ceiling windows on one side for natural lighting and ventilation. The layout respects Vastu by facing eastwards.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-plan living room designed as the bachelor pad's central space, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize daylight, ensuring a bright and airy atmosphere in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchenette, providing a casual dining space. Positioned to allow easy access from the main living area.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A compact yet functional kitchen design optimized for a bachelor pad, with natural lighting facilitated by floor-to-ceiling windows positioned in accordance with Vastu guidelines (south or east direction).

rooms.name: Utility/Service Area
rooms.description: Essential services including storage, washing area. Sited towards the rear to maintain separation from living spaces.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest room with ample natural light via floor-to-ceiling windows following Vastu norms (south-east positioning).

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Connected to the guest bedroom and designed for privacy while ensuring good ventilation.

openings.description: The entrance door is placed in accordance with Vastu by the north side. It features a modern, inviting design.
